LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_SignalSurge.label: signal surge
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_SignalSurge.descrip: A synthetic solution containing a wide range of highly conductive and signal-boosting compounds is surging through the sensor and control networks of the chassis, greatly improving information flow. Until it wears off, the unit will benefit from a minor consciousness boost.
